data.eml:eml: Identity of the tree-spider crab, Parasesarma leptosoma (Hilgendorf, 1869) (Decapoda: Brachyura: Sesarmidae), with descriptions of seven new species from the Western Pacific

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Li, Jheng-Jhang, Rahayu, Dwi Listyo, Ng, Peter K. L. (2018): Identity of the tree-spider crab, Parasesarma leptosoma (Hilgendorf, 1869) (Decapoda: Brachyura: Sesarmidae), with descriptions of seven new species from the Western Pacific. Zootaxa 4482 (3): 451-490, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4482.3.2
